title: SHM - graph changing mass and amplitude

content.question: The graph shown in Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> represents the position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> as a function of time for an object of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> oscillating along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis while attached to a horizontal spring.
